author: Antoinette Bueno
title: The Best, Worst and Most Revealing Dresses at the 'Vanity Fair' Oscars After-Party: Pics!

persons.name: pascal le segretain/getty images mary j. blige

text: The Best, Worst and Most Revealing Dresses at the 'Vanity Fair' Oscars After-Party: Pics! by Antoinette Bueno 10:57   The stars were dressed to impress at the star-studded Vanity Fair Oscars after-party on Sunday in Beverly Hills, California. Let's check out the best, worst and most revealing dresses at the A-list soiree. BEST: Kate Upton, 24, looked sensational in a sparky gown, which she paired with a sideswept 'do. Photo: . Demi Lovato, 24, also looked elegant in a lavender gown fit for a princess. Photo: John Shearer/Getty Images Meanwhile, Olivia Munn, 36, was a vision in red. Photo: Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images MOST NAKED: Gabrielle Union, 44, was definitely out to turn heads in a barely-there gown that just has to be seen to be believed. Photo: John Shearer/Getty Images Diane Kruger, 40, also showed a whole lot of leg in a silver minidress. Photo: Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Mary J. Blige, 46, went the edgy route as well, showing off her toned abs and some underboob in a see-through cut-out dress. Photo: Getty Images WORST: As for those who missed the mark, 35-year-old Jessica Alba's ruffle creation definitely wasn't her best. Photo: Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Mindy Kaling, 37, also had an off night with a loud flower dress. Photo: Getty Images ... And 42-year-old Sarah Paulson's two-tone yellow-and-black gown needs no explanation. Photo: Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images One couple that dazzled at the Oscars? Jessica Biel and Justin Timberlake, who talked to ET about their adorable son, Silas, hitting his terribly twos a little early! Watch below: RELATED SLIDESHOW
